short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts links to viewable images in chat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Say goodbye to tedious link clicking! Our Chrome extension replaces image links with the actual images in Twitch chat, allowing you to enjoy a more immersive and engaging experience. No more interruptions, just seamless browsing and chatting. Try it out now and take your Twitch experience to the next level!
